channel.title: [Pi] PortForwarding [Pi]
channel.description: Hey guys, I have the Samsung 4g lte Mobile Hotspot, and it's portforwarding system is not like others. I need help figuring out how to port forward my server on it. Please help me out! I changed internet and now I can't figure it out!

item.title: [Pi] PortForwarding [Pi]

Hey guys, I have the Samsung 4g lte Mobile Hotspot, and it’s portforwarding system is not like others. I need help figuring out how to port forward my server on it. Please help me out! I changed internet and now I can’t figure it out!
